comments.en:
The "cljet5" driver in GNU GhostScript 6.51 is buggy, often only the first page gets printed and then GhostScript quits with an error message. Use "cljet5c" instead (when using Foomatic keep the default setting "Contone" for the "Mode" option).

The printing system/execution information for this driver serves also for the other cljet5c drivers.
Should work fine with this color laserjet driver.
